description:
Learn branding from a 7 year marketing consultant and professional copywriter.

Branding can be performed by anyone with a product or service. It doesn't matter how special your product or service is because branding is actually in the mind of the customer.

There's a lot of confusion when it comes to branding... some people think it's as easy as coming up with a catchy tagline, but there's more to branding than just advertising.

To correctly brand a product, you have to know the 3 main building blocks of branding as well as how to communicate those 3 concepts. You also have to learn the skill of consistency throughout the whole branding process, to you don't create cross-signals in your customer's mind.

In this course I'll show you what is important, what is relevant and what is essential when we are branding a new product, service, or business.

You can learn from my experience which I built up during the last 7 years branding for small and big companies around the world and teaching branding workshops.

  • You will learn how to apply the membership system to nearly any business
  • You will see how referrals can be the best form of branding
  • You will learn the right order of the steps in brand creation
  • I show you the 4 main strategic branding decisions


You get a full 30-Days-Money-Back-Guarantee. So there is no risk of taking this course. Go for it – click the “take this course" button at the top.
title: Branding: How I Create Clear Market Positions for My Clients
